Name: Smash team
About the game: Multiplayer arenas with different game modes. A choice of 5 characters with different characteristics. 5 arenas available, in 3 modes 1 - All weapons 2 - Only sniper rifles 3 - Melee orgy only Team game 2 on 2. Use in a battle of 12 types of weapons. There is also a backpack, helmet, armor. The goal of the game is to destroy the enemy team. Each character has different characteristics, movement speed, life, and starting items. You can create a server as a third person and in the first person
